attributes.action: Prohibit self-appointed bans of what people can and can't wear
attributes.additional_details:
Racist sombreros, (refuted by the British Mexican Society)
https://www.independent.co.uk/student/news/university-of-east-anglia-students-union-bans-racist-mexican-sombreros-from-freshers-fair-a6671236.html 

Hooped earrings 
https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/fashion/hoop-earrings-cultural-appropriation-latina-ethnicity-race-white-women-fashion-a8004381.html

It is important to note that cultural appropriation does sometimes have an important role in genuinely protecting all cultures.
attributes.background: Several articles and videos have appeared where self-appointed gatekeepers are forbidding those of different races to appreciate and use certain aspects from different cultures. This includes hooped-earrings, braided hair, dreadlocks, sombreros and more. This is regression to a dividing society.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament haven't banned any forms of clothing or hairstyles.
